title: Submit an Expedited Safety Report (e.g., 15-day report)
description: A serious, unexpected adverse event has been processed and must be submitted to the FDA within 15 calendar days.

tasks.description: Verify that the case has been fully processed and medically reviewed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the case is quality checked and ready for submission.

tasks.description: Generate the electronic submission file (e.g., an E2B XML file).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the E2B file from the safety database.

tasks.description: Submit the file to the health authority via the electronic submission gateway.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the file to the FDA gateway.

tasks.description: Receive and archive the electronic acknowledgement from the health authority.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the acknowledgement (MDN) and attaches it to the case record as proof of submission.
